name: Stickman crazy money
description:
Stickman crazy money – one of the best clickers among stickman games and killing games free! The game has soaked up all the best from the world of stickman dismount and stickman destruction games!

Make the stickman the richest on the planet!
Crazy clicker with the fighting Stickman in the lead role! You have an endless bundle of dollars, which you are throwing into him. For the money, he can buy different goodies, show tricks, dance; stickman might become a mafia boss, fighting, and killing to destroy anyone out of favor or an entertainer - anything for your money! Spare no effort, keep throwing the notes from the bundle and remember – it depends only on you if the Stickman is going to be a millionaire or a beggar.

Forget all stickman games you played before, install a new clicker Stickman crazy money and the happiness will come!

Unique mechanics of the game!
- you are throwing the money
- you are killing to destroy the competitors
- you are earning earn money

The best time killer among other stickman games! You are easily killing time, playing this killing game free!

Key features:
Amazing tricks in the style of stickman dismount and stickman destruction games
HD graphics
Several story lines, where anyone might be killing to destroy the fighting stickman Unique sound-track
One of the best hard-core game plays among all stickman killing games free
Characters from stickman dismount and stickman destruction games
Exciting fighting of the main characters.

The game is free.
